com.brightcove.mobile.mediaapi.utils
Class CollectionUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.brightcove.mobile.mediaapi.utils.CollectionUtils

public class CollectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This is a fairly simple set of static methods to perform operations on Collection objects (Lists, Arrays, Vectors, Sets, etc).

Author:
Sander Gates

Method Detail

joinToString

public static java.lang.String joinToString(java.util.List<?> pList,
                                            java.lang.String pDelimiter)

Given a List and a delimiter, creates a delimited string of the objects in the List (using the toString() method of each object).

Parameters:
pList - List of objects
pDelimiter - Delimiter to separate the objects in the output String
Returns:
Delimited String of the objects in the List

joinToString

public static java.lang.String joinToString(java.util.List<?> pList,
                                            java.lang.String pDelimiter,
                                            java.lang.Boolean pEscapeDelimiter,
                                            java.lang.String pEscapeSequence)

Given a List and a delimiter, creates a delimited string of the objects in the List (using the toString() method of each object).

Parameters:
pList - List of objects
pDelimiter - Delimiter to separate the objects in the output String
pEscapeDelimiter - If true, delimiters in the original strings will be escaped with escapeSequence
pEscapeSequence - String to escape delimiters with
Returns:
Delimited String of the objects in the List

Given a Set and a delimiter, creates a delimited string of the objects in the Set (using the toString() method of each object).

Parameters:
pSet - Set of objects
pDelimiter - Delimiter to separate the objects in the output String
Returns:
Delimited String of the objects in the Set

joinToString

public static java.lang.String joinToString(java.util.Set<?> pSet,
                                            java.lang.String pDelimiter,
                                            java.lang.Boolean pEscapeDelimiter,
                                            java.lang.String pEscapeSequence)

Given a Set and a delimiter, creates a delimited string of the objects in the Set (using the toString() method of each object).

Parameters:
pSet - Set of objects
pDelimiter - Delimiter to separate the objects in the output String
pEscapeDelimiter - If true, delimiters in the original strings will be escaped with escapeSequence
pEscapeSequence - String to escape delimiters with
Returns:
Delimited String of the objects in the Set
